name: parkrun-statistics
description: Backend for ParkRun statistics web app
author: Antti Väisänen

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:scraper
scripts.package:api: npm run build:api && cd build/api && npm prune --production && zip -r ../../api.zip .
scripts.package:scraper: npm run build:scraper && cd build/scraper && npm prune --production && zip -r ../../scraper.zip .
scripts.package: npm run package:api && npm run package:scraper
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && npx prisma migrate reset --force
